title: CIA Lincoln Chase Brownell & Mary "Jerry" Hester Gaskill (Central Intelligence Agency)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all files that the Central Intelligence Agency has that mention either Lincoln Chase Brownell (b. 6 Jun 1914 Canton, China, d. 26 Dec 2010 Williston, VT) or Mary "Jerry" Hester Gaskill (b. 12 Feb 1916 Mays Landing, NJ, m. 30 Aug 1941 Knoxville, TN, d. 24 Jun 2007 Williston, VT).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samuel Harris Brownell

title: CIA Lincoln Chase Brownell & Mary "Jerry" Hester Gaskill (U.S. Department of State)

Dear FBI:

This is a request for records under the Freedom of Information Act.

RECORDS REQUESTED
I request all records related to Pamela Harrison Turnure Timmins. She was born on 20 November 1937 in New York City, New York, USA. She died on 25 April 2023 in Edwards, Colorado. She was press secretary to First Lady Jackie Kennedy. Her obituary appeared in the Washington Post https://www.washingtonpost.com/obituaries/2023/04/29/pamela-turnure-jackie-kennedy-dead/

OTHER NAMES USED
The subject was born Pamela Harrison Turnure.

CROSS-REFERENCE SEARCH
Please do a cross-reference search for additional records related to the subject. Specifically, please search files related to President John Fitzgerald Kennedy; First Lady Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis; Aristotle Onassis; Prince Ali Salman Aga Khan (d. 12 May 1960), whom the subject dated; Robert N. Timmins (d. 1990), to whom the subject was married; and any other files likely to have responsive records.

REQUEST FOR FEE WAIVER
I request that all fees associated with this request be waived. The requested documents will be made available to the general public online for free via MuckRock.com, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. If you decide to charge me fees, please inform me of the fee amount before fulfilling my request.

FORM OF PRODUCTION
Please fulfill this request electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

CONCLUSION

Many thanks,

Nicholas Marritz
